dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2211 IS: Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Collins (for herself and Mrs. Shaheen) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Special Diabetes Program for Type 1 Diabetes and the Special Diabetes Program for Indians.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2025.

subsection.header: Special diabetes programs for type I diabetes
subsection.text: Section 330B(b)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254c–2(b)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (F), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in subparagraph (G), by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: $160,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 and 2027, to remain available until expended; and
$40,000,000 for the period beginning on October 1, 2027, and ending on December 31, 2027, to remain available until expended.

subsection.text: Section 330C(c)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254c–3(c)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (F), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in subparagraph (G), by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: $160,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 and 2027, to remain available until expended; and
$40,000,000 for the period beginning on October 1, 2027, and ending on December 31, 2027, to remain available until expended.
